heading: Program Leadership
description: Meet our distinguished academic leader driving excellence in BBA education.

profile.name: Prof. (Dr.) Amit Nautiyal
profile.title: Dean, Management
bio: Prof. (Dr.) Amit Nautiyal brings over 24 years of distinguished experience in both corporate and academic spheres. As Professor and Dean of the Management Department at Shivalik College of Engineering, he provides strategic leadership to both MBA and BBA programs, combining academic rigor with industry-relevant excellence.

With a Ph.D. in Management, Dr. Nautiyal's research centers on policyholder education and insurance buying behavior. His academic contributions include 21 research publications, 2 patents, and 2 intramural projects. He serves as an evaluator for the UGC's "Dr. D.S. Kothari Research Grant" and is a member of the editorial boards of two Scopus-indexed journals.

Prior to academia, Dr. Amit Nautiyal held leadership roles at ICICI Prudential, TATA-AIG, and PNB MetLife. His professional journey includes senior academic positions at UPES and Swami Rama Himalayan University, along with delivering impactful MDPs and FDPs for organizations such as ONGC, Oil India, THDC, and NIESBUD.
